text_block_list.text:
Yo, Tray-chan. 
Did you see that new crowdfunding campaign?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
This one's so cool— Oh! 
Those cupcakes just released today, right?
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: They're great with Earl Grey tea.

text_block_list.text:
I place the usual teacups onto the table. Transcend, 
the umamusume in front of me nods excitedly.

Thanks for the tea! The cupcakes are... Raspberry and 
banana... Which do you want?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Actually, we can share halfsies. That way we can try both. 
Oh, right, about that new crowdfunder—
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
We chatted like comfy friends, and it's been like this 
for a while. Right, it all started with that first encounter...

It was a cold and snowy day. I decided to take a breather 
from work and spend some time on my hobbies.

I like to spend my time on things I've never seen 
or experienced before.

One such thing being the filming of a B movie. 
I was on my way to observe one, when...
Ah, hi there. Can I stand here?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Oh, they're starting. I wonder how it's gonna go... 
This director's known to be a bit eccentric, 
so I'm looking forward to it.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text: And when I went to a wacky gadget exhibition...

Oh? It's you, from that film shoot. 
What a coincidence! I wonder if we have similar taste?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Did you see the main attraction? 
I like how it syncs with your phone, and it charges—
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
We kept finding each other in different places, 
and eventually we started having small talk together.

Aha, you're looking to scout someone. I see how that 
can be tricky. Tracen is full of skilled individuals.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Hmm... I've got a proposal for you. 
I'll provide you with information.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Yep. Things you can't grasp from simply looking, 
like their personalities. Things only other 
umamusume would know!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Oh and... My info doesn't come free, y'know? How abooout... 
Some nice tea and snacks. Whadda ya think?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text: Transcend has more information than could be explained just by her being an umamusume herself... I wonder where she gets it all from.
I once asked her why she only wanted tea and snacks for all of this info, and she simply replied "Because it's fun!"

I brought the good stuff about some dirt girls today. 
I'm sure you've seen them before as well.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
This is how our relation is. No formalities. 
It's like we've become close friends.

Here's the first target. Furioso. She's got that honor student 
vibe. She speaks her mind without hesitation, so the 
timid girls tend to avoid her.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
But she's actually not scary at all, just a bit serious. 
Also, although she may seem calm at first glance... 
She gets intense when she's going all out!
text_block_list.name: Transcend
Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Next up: Espoir City. She seems a bit overly self-confident, 
like she's in her rebellious phase... If you catch my drift.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
But really, she's pure at heart under that veneer. 
Also... I noticed when we went to a race course together...
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
She gets startled by the intensity of the giant trackside 
screens. She keeps tripping up. Looks like she's got 
a delicate side, too. Cute, right?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Lastly: Smart Falcon. 
She's trying to become the top Umadol.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Her fanservice game is on point. She's able to remember 
the faces of all her fans. Crazy, right? You'll certainly 
end up a fan as well, if you choose her.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Even though she's considered a dirt runner, she's trying 
to main turf training recently. I wonder if it'll work out...
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text: That's all. That cheerful trio sure is interesting. Although, I bet I won't ever get tired of you either!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
I bet you want to see them race in person, right? 
I'll come along when you do.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
And if you notice anything that stands out, 
be sure to let me know as well, 'kay?
text_block_list.name: Transcend
choice_data_list: You better pay me for that info..!

text_block_list.text:
Haha! I'll just pay you back with more info! 
I'll be the one to wait for the tea and snacks.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
She smiles at me like the mischievous geek she is. 
I'd better bust out the bestest snacks next time.
